name: Duo Spells
description:
The Five Great Dark Wizards cannot be defeated in a duel.

But an ancient legend says that a Dou Spell can harm even an immortal.

The mages Sinistram and Dextro need your help to synchronize your spells and defeat the dark wizards.

How to Play 🎮

• Use AWSD to control Sinistram's spells

• Use Arrow Keys to control Dextro's spells

• Use R to reset the round

Team ⚒️ • Euler Moisés: 🎨🎵 Art / Audio
Portfolio: https://euler-moises.itch.io • Felipe Inoue: 💻 Code
